org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed

Class GridPartitioner

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.Partitioner
      • org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.GridPartitioner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GridPartitioner
extends Partitioner
    A grid partitioner, which uses a regular grid to partition coordinates.

    See Also:

      • getPartition

        public int getPartition(Object key)
        Returns the index of the partition the input coordinate belongs to.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in class Partitioner
        Parameters:
        key - The coordinate (i, j) or a tuple (i, j, k), where k is the inner index used in multiplication. k is ignored in computing partitions.
        Returns:
        The index of the partition, which the coordinate belongs to.
